mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.cheliang_uuid_number as cheliangUuidNumber ,a.cheliang_name as cheliangName ,a.cheliang_types as cheliangTypes ,a.cheliang_status_types as cheliangStatusTypes ,a.cheliang_content as cheliangContent ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段
FROM cheliang a
and a.id in
#{item}
and a.cheliang_uuid_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.cheliangUuidNumber},'%')
and a.cheliang_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.cheliangName},'%')
and a.cheliang_types = #{params.cheliangTypes}
and a.cheliang_status_types = #{params.cheliangStatusTypes}
and a.cheliang_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.cheliangContent},'%')
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
